resources.string: " select p._id, p.name, p.image, pt.image as typeImage, (select count(1) from Room where property = p._id) as childrenCount from Property p join PropertyType pt ON p.type = pt._id order by p.name asc "
" select p._id, p.name, p.type, p.image, pt.image as typeImage from Property p join PropertyType pt ON p.type = pt._id where p._id = ? "
" insert into Property(name, type, image) values(?, ?, ?) "
" update Property set name = ?, type = ?, image = ? where _id = ? "
" delete from Property where _id = ? "
" delete from Room where property = ? "
" select _id, name from PropertyType order by priority "
" select _id, name from PropertyType where name like ? escape '\' order by priority "
" select _id, name from RoomType order by priority "

" select r._id, r.root, r.name, r.image, COALESCE(rt.image, rtk.image) as typeImage, (select count(1) from Item where parent = r.root) as childrenCount from Room r join RoomType rt ON r.type = rt._id join RoomTypeKind rtk ON rt.kind = rtk._id where r.property = ? order by r.name asc "

" select r._id, r.name, r.type, r.root, r.property, r.image, COALESCE(rt.image, rtk.image) as typeImage from Room r join RoomType rt ON r.type = rt._id join RoomTypeKind rtk ON rt.kind = rtk._id where r._id = ? "
" insert into Room(property, root, name, type, image) values(?, ?, ?, ?, ?) "
" update Room set name = ?, type = ?, image = ? where _id = ? "
" delete from Room where _id = ? "

" select i._id, i.name, i.image, 'category_unknown' as typeImage, (select count(1) from Item where parent = i._id) as childrenCount, c.name as category from Item i join Category c ON i.category = c._id where i.parent = ? order by i.name asc "

" select i._id, i.name, i.image, 'category_unknown' as typeImage, (select count(1) from Item where parent = i._id) as childrenCount, c.name as category from Item i join Category c ON i.category = c._id where i.category = ? order by i.name asc "
" select i._id, i.name, c.name as category, i.image, 'category_unknown' as typeImage from Item i join Category c ON i.category = c._id where i._id = ? "

" select c._id, c.name, 'category_unknown' as image, (select count(1) from Category where parent = c._id) as childrenCount, (select count(1) from Item where category = c._id) as countItems from Category c where c.parent = ? order by c.name asc "
" select c._id, c.name, 'category_unknown' as typeImage, NULL as image from Category c where c._id = ? "
" insert into Item(parent, name, category, image) values(?, ?, ?, ?) "
" update Item set name = ?, category = ?, image = ? where _id = ? "
" delete from Item where _id = ? "
